page.title: 08VIEWS OF DATCHET COMMUTERS
page.content: by Ramayana,Nicola,Natasha 27 Datchet to London commuters desired these changes in rail travel:- {More frequent,fast trains in rush hour {(59%);lavatories,more "No Smoking" {cars,more fast,later trains at night {(11%);more seats,more comfortable {seats,increased punctuality of trains, {better preparation for de-icing "third {rail" in Winter (7%); cleaner trains, {better communication about delays, {more services between Windsor and {Staines,all trains to stop at Clapham {Junction (4%) Desired Changes at Datchet Station {Clean and decorate station (74%) {New station buildings particularly {waiting room needed (26%);Public {toilets needed (19%);permanent staff {to combat vandalism,higher platform {to suit new train design,public {telephones required (11%).
